Why.value: One dog jump towards IP lef hand that holding the trash bag
IP want to throw away the waste to waste receptacle
IP took the trash bag and walk to waste receptacle located at the back of basecamp area
IP come out from Non staff mess hall and found a trash bag with food leftovers inside
Assumption Dog was trying to take the trash bag for food not to attack the person. Because if the dog was aiming for bite, than the dog probably wont let go IP left hand
